span.span: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 音频数据写入到`outputStream`以二进制形式。Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form. 不不包含任何标头信息。No header information is included. 方法使用波形格式，但不包括批标头。The method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header. 若要包含 Wave 标头，使用方法。To include the Wave header, use the method.
